name: tumorido-fittrack
description: Full-stack application leveraging the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) to create a comprehensive fit tracking app.

scripts.install: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"

keywords: garpql, mern, mongo, experss, react, node, jwt
author: Fabricio Guacuto
